name: Ez and simple Google Map
author: Mike Koh

sections.description:
Thank you for choosing Ez and simple Google Map
* Please remember to give this plugin rating. For any feedback or bugs report email to blue.mike.com@gmail.com

With this plugin you can set the following settings
1. Map zoom
2. Street View Control
3. Map Type (example: roadmap)
4. Zoom Control
5. Marker icon (change of icon)
6. Information window
7. Map Transit Layer
8. Map Bike Layer
9. Map Traffic Layer
